sen.j: 太秦駅（うずまさえき）は、京都府京都市右京区太秦垂箕山町にある、西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）山陰本線（嵯峨野線）の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Uzumasa Tarumiyama-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Uzumasa Station is a stop on Sanin Main Line (Sagano Line) which is operated by West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

Uzumasa Station, located in Uzumasa Tarumiyama-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Sanin Main Line (Sagano Line), which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

Uzumasa Station, located in Uzumasa Tarumiyama-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Sanin Main Line (Sagano Line), which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

sen.j: 駅名電略は「オサウツ」。
sen.e: The cable address of the station name is "Osautsu."
The cable address of the station name is "Osautsu."
The cable address of the station name is 'Osautsu.'

sen.j: ICOCA・Jスルー利用可能駅（相互利用可能ICカードはICOCAの項を参照）。
sen.e: ICOCA and J-Through Card, both an IC card, are available for payment of railway fares at this station; about the compatible IC card with ICOCA, please refer to the article about ICOCA.
sen.cmt: ※ICOCAは"IC Operating Card"の省略形であり、そこに既に"Card"が含まれていることから、Jスルーと異なり英訳では"Card"を付していません。
sen.e: ICOCA and J-Through Card, both of which are IC cards, are available for railway fare payment at this station; for information on which IC cards are compatible with ICOCA, please refer to the article about ICOCA.

ICOCA and J-Through Card, both of which are IC cards, are available for railway fare payment at this station; for information on which IC cards are compatible with ICOCA, please refer to the article about ICOCA.

sen.j: JRの特定都区市内制度における「京都市内」の駅である。
sen.e: Uzumasa Station is a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.
sen.cmt: ①「特定都区市内制度」の定訳は不明ですが、「通信用語の基礎知識」のホームページによれば「JRの旅客営業における、特定の都区市内に適用される料金制度」のことです。 ②これを参考に付けた英訳が"railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas"で、同じ表現がアメリカの学術論文に存在するようです(ただし該当箇所を発見することはできませんでした）。
sen.e: Uzumasa Station is a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.
Uzumasa Station is a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.

sen.j: 近接する鉄道路線
sen.e: Railways near to Uzumasa station
Railways near to Uzumasa Station
Railways near to Uzumasa Station

sen.j: 京福電気鉄道：京福電気鉄道嵐山本線・京福電気鉄道北野線（帷子ノ辻駅・常盤駅_(京都府)）
sen.e: Keifuku Electric Railroad Co.,Ltd.--Arashiyama Main Line/Kitano Line { Katabiranotsuji Station/Tokiwa Station (in Kyoto Prefecture) }
Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.: Arashiyama Main Line/Kitano Line {Katabiranotsuji Station/Tokiwa Station (in Kyoto Prefecture)}
Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.: Arashiyama Main Line/Kitano Line (Katabiranotsuji Station/Tokiwa Station (Kyoto Prefecture))

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Structure of the station
The station's structure
Station layout
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 交換設備を備えた相対式2面2線のプラットホームを持つ地上駅。
sen.e: Equipped with the facilities that enable two trains to pass each other, Uzumasa Station has two separate platforms and two boarding areas, and these platforms are level with the ground.
sen.cmt: ①「相対式2面2線のプラットホームを持つ」とは「相対式のプラットホーム２つと乗り場2つを持つ」ということであり（Wiki 「プラットホーム」参照）、そこでは「プラットホーム」と「乗り場」を訳し分ける必要があることから、前者を"platform"、後者を"boarding area" としています。 ②ここにいう「地上駅（狭義）」とは「プラットホームが地面と同じ高さにある駅」のことであり（Wiki 「地上駅」参照）、それを左では訳出しています。
sen.e: The station, being equipped with facilities that enable two trains to pass each other, has two separate platforms and two boarding areas, and these platforms are level with the ground.

It is an aboveground station having with two separate platforms that face each other with two sets of tracks running between, and it is equipped with facilities that enable two trains to pass each other.
sen.cmt: 地上駅→aboveground station として統一しました。

sen.j: 駅舎は北側にある。
sen.e: The station building is located on the north platform.
The station building is located on the north platform.
The station building is located on the north platform.

sen.j: 一線スルー配線になっており、乗客への利便性向上のため京都行きの普通列車全列車と、当駅で行き違いを行わない園部方面の普通列車は、副本線である駅舎側1番ホームに停車する。
sen.e: Uzumasa Station takes "Issen-through," which means the system of speeding up the prioritized train of two trains, which come from both sides of a single track, by limiting the prioritized train's running line to one track of the specially equipped double track in the station, and in order to promote passengers' convenience, some local trains for Sonobe Station that do not wait for another train to go first at this station & all local trains for Kyoto Station both make a stop at Boarding Area 1, which faces the subsidiary main track and adjoins the station building.
sen.cmt: ①上の16E①に基づき左の「1番ホーム」の「ホーム」は｢乗り場」の意味に解して"boarding area"と訳しています。②「一線スルー（狭義）」とは「単線区間にある駅で双方向から来た列車を行き違いさせる場合に、優先的に通過（スルー）させる方の列車の走る線路を、駅内に特に設けられた複線のうちの一線に限ることで、その通過速度を上げる方式」(Wiki 「一線スルー」参照。）のことで、それを左の2行目から5行目にかけて訳出したつもりです。
sen.e: Uzumasa Station employs "Issen-through," the system of speeding up the prioritized train of two trains, which come from both ends of a single track, by limiting the prioritized train's running line to one track of the specially equipped double track in the station; to promote passenger convenience, some local trains for Sonobe Station that don't wait for another train to go first at this station and all local trains for Kyoto Station stop at boarding area 1, which faces the subsidiary main track and adjoins the station building.

Uzumasa Station employs "Issen-through," the system of speeding up the prioritized train of two trains, which come from both ends of a single track, by limiting the prioritized train's running line to one track of the specially equipped double track in the station; to promote passenger convenience, some local trains for Sonobe Station that don't wait for another train to go first at this station and all local trains for Kyoto Station stop at Platform 1, which faces the subsidiary main track and adjoins the station building.
sen.cmt: 一番ホーム→Platform 1としました。

sen.j: 快速と特急は当駅に停車しないため、基本的に2番線を通過する。
sen.e: As the rapid train & limited express do not make a stop at this station, they basically pass through Boarding Area 2.
Because the rapid train and limited express don't stop at this station, they basically pass through boarding area 2.
Because the rapid train and limited express don't stop at this station, they basically pass through Platform 2.

sen.j: 2007年3月18日の改正で嵯峨野線の列車パターンがかなり変わり、昼間の園部方面行き電車の2番のりば発着が復活した。
sen.e: On March 18, 2007, the operation pattern of trains on Sagano Line was significantly changed, and the trains for Sonobe Station restarted to leave and arrive at Boarding Area 2 during the daytime.
On March 18, 2007, the operation pattern of trains on the Sagano Line was significantly changed, and the trains for Sonobe Station restarted to leave and arrive at boarding area 2 during the daytime.
On March 18, 2007, the operation pattern of trains on the Sagano Line was significantly changed, and the trains for Sonobe Station restarted to leave and arrive at Platform 2 during the daytime.

sen.j: なお駅業務はジェイアール西日本交通サービスへ委託されている。
sen.e: In addition, the operation of the station is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.
Additionally, the station's operation is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.
Additionally, the station's operation is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.

sen.j: 利用状況
sen.e: Situation of the passengers' use
Passenger usage statistics
Passenger use
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約4,364人である。
sen.e: The number of passengers who used this station in fiscal 2006 was about 4364 a day.
The average daily number of passengers who used this station in fiscal 2006 was 4,364.
The average daily number of passengers who used this station in fiscal year 2006 was 4,364.
sen.cmt: fiscal → fiscal yearに変更しました。

sen.j: （京都府統計書より）
sen.e: (according to the statistics of Kyoto Prefecture)
(According to the statistics of Kyoto Prefecture)
(According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 「映画村の太秦」の印象で利用する観光客の他にも、近辺に住宅などが建ち並んでいるということもあって、駅規模の割に利用客は比較的多い。
sen.e: Tourists use the station associating the name of Uzumasa with "Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura)," and also, houses and other buildings stand around the station, so the number of passengers is relatively large for the size of the station.

Tourists use the station by associating the name of Uzumasa with "Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura)"; moreover, houses and other buildings stand around the station, so the number of passengers is relatively large in comparison to the station.

Tourists use the station by associating the name of Uzumasa with 'Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura)'; moreover, houses and other buildings stand around the station, so the number of passengers is relatively large in comparison to the station.

sen.j: 円町駅開業前は当駅で下車し、嵐電（京福）帷子ノ辻駅から北野線で北野天満宮や立命館大学衣笠校舎へ向かう利用者も多かった。
sen.e: Before the opening of Enmachi Station, many passengers got off the train here at Uzumasa Station and got on another train at Randen (Keifuku) Katabiranotsuji Station on Kitano Line to go to Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine or Ritsumeikan University Kinugasa Campus.

Before the opening of Enmachi Station, many passengers would get off the train here at Uzumasa Station and then board another train at Randen (Keifuku) Katabiranotsuji Station on the Kitano Line in order to go to Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine or Ritsumeikan University Kinugasa Campus.

Before the opening of Emmachi Station, many passengers would get off the train here at Uzumasa Station and then board another train at Randen (Keifuku) Katabiranotsuji Station on the Kitano Line in order to go to Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine or Ritsumeikan University Kinugasa Campus.

sen.j: 駅周辺
sen.e: Surroundings of the station
The station's surroundings
Station surroundings
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 帷子ノ辻駅は南に約300m離れているが、乗換客は割合に多い。
sen.e: Katabiranotsuji Station is three hundred meters to the south of Uzumasa Station, but there is a considerable number of passengers changing trains between the two stations.
Katabiranotsuji Station is 300 meters south of Uzumasa Station, but considerable numbers of passengers change trains between the two stations.
Katabiranotsuji Station is 300 meters south of Uzumasa Station, but considerable numbers of passengers change trains between the two stations.

sen.j: 周辺は住宅地である。
sen.e: The neighborhood is a residential area.
The neighborhood is a residential area.
The neighborhood is a residential area.

sen.j: 駅の東500mほどに広隆寺、東映京都撮影所及び東映太秦映画村があるが、映画村へは花園駅 (京都府)から行く方が、わかり易くてやや早い。
sen.e: There exist Koryu-ji Temple, Toei Kyoto Movie Studios and Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura), all about five hundred meters to the east of Uzumasa Station, but you can go to Toei Movie Land more easily and in a bit shorter time from Hanazono Station (in Kyoto Prefecture) than from Uzumasa Station.

Koryu-ji Temple, Toei Kyoto Movie Studios and Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura) are all about 500 meters to the east of Uzumasa Station, but one can go to Toei Movie Land more easily and in a slightly shorter time from Hanazono Station (Kyoto Prefecture) than from Uzumasa Station.

Koryu-ji Temple, Toei Kyoto Movie Studios and Toei Movie Land (Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura) are all about 500 meters to the east of Uzumasa Station, but one can go to Toei Movie Land more easily and in a slightly shorter time from Hanazono Station (Kyoto Prefecture) than from Uzumasa Station.

sen.j: ゴールデンウィークには、東映京都撮影所が休暇のため撮影所を開放して、東映太秦映画村の「臨時駐車場」や映画村の「裏口」として利用する場合がある。
sen.e: During "Golden Week," which means the Japanese vacation period from late April to early May, Toei Kyoto Movie Studios are also in vacation, so they are open to the public and are occasionally used as the special parking lot or as the back door of Toei Movie Land.

During "Golden Week," Japan's vacation period from late April to early May, production activity at Toei Kyoto Movie Studios also ceases, so the facilities are open to the public and are occasionally used as a special parking lot or as the back door of Toei Movie Land.

During "Golden Week," Japan's vacation period from late April to early May, production activity at Toei Kyoto Movie Studios also ceases, so the facilities are open to the public and are occasionally used as a special parking lot or as the back door of Toei Movie Land.

sen.j: なお、太秦駅から映画村に徒歩で行く場合、以下のルートとなる。
sen.e: In addition, if you want to go to Toei Movie Land from Uzumasa Station on foot, please take the route as follows :
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処（後続の文章が道案内なので、その旨が形式上も明らかになるように、コロンで区切りました。)
sen.e: Additionally, if you want to go to Toei Movie Land from Uzumasa Station on foot, please take the following route:
Additionally, if you want to go to Toei Movie Land from Uzumasa Station on foot, please take the following route:

sen.j: 駅舎から右方向へ出て 山陰本線の踏切を渡らずに北（左）へ約200mの変則4差路を東（右）へ。
sen.e: First, get out of the station building to the right, and do NOT go across the railway crossing of Sanin Main Line but go straight to the north (your left) about two hundred meters, and then, turn at the atypical four road junction to the east (your right);
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。
sen.e: First, leave the station building and turn to the right, but do NOT go across the railway crossing of the Sanin Main Line; instead, go straight to the north (your left) about 200 meters and turn at the atypical four-road junction to the east (your right);

First, leave the station building and turn to the right, but do NOT go across the railway crossing of the Sanin Main Line; instead, go straight to the north (your left) about 200 meters and turn at the atypical four-road junction to the east (your right);

sen.j: 京都府立嵯峨野高等学校を左手に見て、京福（嵐電）北野線の踏切を渡り、そのまま 下立売通を約500m歩き、3灯信号のある交差点を南（右）へ。
sen.e: and keep following Shimodachiuri-dori Street about five hundred meters---along the way, you will see Kyoto Prefectural Sagano High School on your left and you will go across the railway crossing of Keifuku (Randen) Kitano Line---and then, turn at a three-lamp signal on a junction to the south (your right);
sen.cmt: 「楽天マップ『太秦駅』周辺の地図」を参照しました。
sen.e: keep following Shimodachiuri-dori Street about 500 meters--along the way you'll see Kyoto Prefectural Sagano High School on your left and will go across the railway crossing of Keifuku (Randen) Kitano Line--and then turn at a three-lamp signal at a junction to the south (your right);

keep following Shimodachiuri-dori Street about 500 meters--along the way you'll see Kyoto Prefectural Sagano High School on your left and will go across the railway crossing of Keifuku (Randen) Kitano Line--and then turn at a three-lamp signal at a junction to the south (your right);

sen.j: （ここで初めて山陰本線の高架をくぐる）約200mで到着することが出来る。
sen.e: and go straight about two hundred meters---along the way, you will cross under the overhead railway of Sanin Main Line for the first time---and finally you will be able to arrive at Toei Movie Land.
sen.cmt: 「楽天マップ『太秦駅』周辺の地図」を参照しました。
sen.e: and go straight about two hundred meters--along the way you'll cross under the overhead railway of the Sanin Main Line for the first time--and finally you'll arrive at Toei Movie Land.
and go straight about 200 meters--along the way you'll cross under the overhead railway of the Sanin Main Line for the first time--and finally you'll arrive at Toei Movie Land.
